body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jordan Brooks and the customer's name is Stephanie Bryant.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Roofing Service ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Jordan Brooks, and I represent MetaCar, your trusted roofing service provider.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Stephanie! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit frustrated with the roofing issue I've been experiencing lately.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Stephanie. Could you provide me with a bit more detail about the issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I've noticed some leaks during heavy rain.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that. Can I please get the address of the property where the issue is occurring?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's at twenty three hundred Maple Drive.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! Lastly, could you provide me with your phone number for follow-up purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. It's four zero four, two five six, eight one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Stephanie! I appreciate your time today. We will get someone out to assess the situation soon.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Jordan. I look forward to hearing from you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Have a great day, and thank you for choosing MetaCar!
